name: Pressure/Altitude Gauge
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Interface screen: Pressure/Altitude Gauge, grid-based layout with spacing, icons, meters, controls, fantasy UI (parchment/metal/wood motifs), high contrast, readable, merged-zone aesthetic, reality fractures, hybrid aquatic-sky motifs, palette: teal/indigo blends, storm gold accents, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Typography must be crisp and readable (sans-serif, high contrast, WCAG 4.5:1). Prefer short, real labels (STR, DEX, HP, BAG, MAP) or clean unlabeled slots. Avoid nonsense strings. Ensure 8â€“24 pt equivalent sizing and consistent alignment., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
revised_prompt: Imagine a heroic tabletop fantasy scene with medieval materials, such as parchment, metal, and wood. Please create a grid-based layout with space between each square for decorated icons, meters, and controls. Craft this layout using a painterly style that adheres to the aesthetics of a D&D 5e fantasy UI. Apply an aesthetic that merges reality and fantasy, integrating aquatic and sky motifs. Use a color palette that blends teal and indigo hues with accents of storm gold. The display interface screen should show a Pressure/Altitude Gauge. Typography should be large, sans-serif, high contrast, and abiding by WCAG 4.5:1 guidelines for readability. Incorporate short, practical labels such as 'STR', 'DEX', 'HP', 'BAG', 'MAP', or clean unlabeled slots. Avoid garbled or random letter strings, instead use recognizable icons, symbols, or numbered pins. Please avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, and an anime style, bloom glare, and remember to avoid artifacts.
